Class BusNodesDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • velinov.java.finken.ivybus.BusNodesDispatcher

  • public class BusNodesDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Joins and disconnects AbsFinkenDrones from the Ivy-bus on request.

    Author:
    Vladimi Velinov
